title: Brenthaven
body: While contracting with Brenthaven, I assisted with the transition as they launched their latest e-commerce website. Standardizing and streamlining their inventory of images to ensure a quality look and feel.
I also supported their marketing department with A/B testing e-news campaigns, produced print and digtial collatoral which included store signage, news ads, and YouTube tutorials.
All images © Brenthaven
*All promotions, discounts, and prices listed within ad samples are void and long expired.

title: Microsoft IT Showcase
body: As a Branding Subject Mater Expert (SME) for Microsoft, I had the pleasure of consulting on projects for several teams including Microsoft IT Showcase.
Here is a small sample of the hundreds of infographics, white papers, PowerPoint presentations, and other designs I helped develop and design over a four year period.

title: Pet Partners - Pet Health
body: Pet Partners is a non-profit organization that specializes in training and certifying service animals who interact with those in need. In particular, veterans suffering from PTSD and seniors living with Alzheimers.
When working on any illustrations of this nature, I use source materials. All models used are either provided by the client, or sourced from stock sites.

title: New York Fashion Academy
body: While attending courses at the New York Fashion Academy (now known as Seattle Fashion Academy and located in Seattle's Lake City neighborhood), I volunteered my design services to help promote the school's annual runway show, fundraisers, and other promotional events.

title: Entirenet - Corporate
body: I assisted Entirenet with both their in-house and client design needs. Entirenet's clients included companies such as Microsoft, Pet Partners, and Amazon.
These samples show an array of work I did specifically for Entirenet - Corporate to strengthen their corporate brand.

title: Hewlett-Packard Aftermarket
body: While working in Hewlett-Packard's Aftermarket division, I designed poster layouts, quick start guides, ensured HP branding standards were met, and contributed to several special projects.
All images © Hewlett-Packard

title: Hewlett-Packard Technical Illustration
body: For six years I worked as one of Hewlett-Packard's primary Technical Illustrators.

title: Chrissy Roshak
body: Local artist Chrissy Roshak provided me the opportunity to work with her beautifully expressive paintings & drawings in this series to promote her show.
All images © Chrissy Roshak

title: Spacelabs Healthcare
body: Spacelabs Healthcare hired me to re-create a template concept that another designer had made using a software that could not be used for complex document processing. I took that concept and re-created it in Adobe FrameMaker.

Included in template package:

  • master pages
  • reference pages
  • character styles
  • paragraph styles
  • table styles
  • branding color pallets
  • primary and secondary TOCs
  • indices
  • appendices

*Onsite training of best practices for using FrameMaker templates.
All images © Spacelabs Healthcare

title: Compaq Quick Start Guides
body: Here is a sampling of some of the Quick Start Guides I did while working on Hewlett-Packard's sister brand, Compaq.
All images © Hewlett-Packard
tags: Altering templates to accomodate localization strings

title: Smashing the Ceiling
body: While at Chickpop Records I worked as the Office Manager and Assistant to Magdalen Hsu-Li (musician, artist, speaker, and cultural activist in the LGBT+ community). I also worked on marketing/graphics, promotions, bookings and tour logistics for Magdalen's shows.
All images © Magdalen Hsu-Li

title: Mission Farms
body: Sales sheets and Banner Ads for Mission Farms.

title: Herd Freed Hartz
body: When it's imporant to reflect the branding of your cients. The work I do for Herd Freed Hartz allows me the opportunity to do something a little different every time.

title: Norwescon
body: For the past few seasons I have volunteered my design services to Norwescon, a local science fiction and fantasy convention.
